commit.message:
Auto merge of #79620 - JohnTitor:label-name-sugg, r=davidtwco

Tweak diagnostics on shadowing lifetimes/labels

Fixes #79610

Skip adding a new test assuming we have already sufficient tests.

files.patch:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ error[E0496]: lifetime name `'a` shadows a lifetime name that is already in scop
 LL | impl<'a> Foo<'a> {
    |      -- first declared here
 LL |     fn f<'a>(x: &'a i32) {
-   |          ^^ lifetime 'a already in scope
+   |          ^^ lifetime `'a` already in scope

-   |              ^^ lifetime 'a already in scope
+   |              ^^ lifetime `'a` already in scope
